Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera Package
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Grow
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Pentax X-5 camera kit as a Christmas gift and have been very impressed with the camera & the accesory kit.  We took it to Gatlinburg TN for New Years Eve and took some outstanding pictures of the ball drop.  I was also very happy with the quick delivery before Christmas.  Great job Amazon & Cameta Camera.  I will gladly recommend this camera & distributors to anyone.Pentax X-5 Megazoom 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Silver) with 16GB Card + Batteries/Charger + Case + 2 Tripods + Accessory Kit

Reviews.Title: What a GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Thomas D Frogh
Reviews.Content: I bought this before a trip overseas.  There is a car museum I like and I wanted better pictures on this trip.  WOW.  This camera behaved fantastically.  I took photography classes years ago, and could fuss with the manual settings, but the point and shoot capabilities of this camera makes me not bother.  I shot just shy of 1000 photos in 5 hours with pretty awful lighting and it did great.  Most were taken without the flash and its image stabilization was spot on.  The controls are pretty easy to figure out.This is the perfect camera between the Point-and-shoot range and the wiz-bang range.  To me, it was the deal of the year.  The Free Bag in the kit was not all that great.  It is well made but not shaped well for the bulk of this camera.Big plus, long life on the batteries.  Bigger plus, AA batteries!!!

Reviews.Title: Already own 35mm Pentax but wanted to get into digital photography and this Pentax offered a great opportunity for a quality uni
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Complete package with everything needed to take professional quality photo's at non professional price! Easy to use for both armatures as well as more experienced photographers.
